description: Provides expenditure data summarized by each agency and general ledger account. The general ledger account may be viewed by major class, sub-class or detail expenditure code. Examples of the major class expenditure category include: • Personal Services • Travel Expenses • Administrative Expense • Property, Furniture, Equipment and Related Debt • General Assistance, Awards, Grants, & Other • Program-Directed Payments • Transfers and Other Disbursements

name: Expenditure Summary - Fiscal Year 2013
